Package net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j

Interface Summary
DirItemInterface The Request classes returns sortable lists of classes implementing the DirItemInterface to implement directory listings.
HttpHandleable Interface with all the overidable methods that handlers provide.
Postable An interface that must be implemented by classes processing POST requests.
Templatable An interface that must be implemented by template populating class used by StringTemplateHandler.
 

Class Summary
ArchiveCombinedRequest Support for combining several style sheets or javascripts for archive or classpath based requests into one request.
ArchiveHttpd Implementation of the abstract Httpd class for web content in a jar in the classpath or in an archive.
ArchiveRequest Encapsulates an HTTP request for a resource in an archive or inside a jar in the classpath.
ArchiveRequestHandler An abstraction of a handler for archive or classpath based HTTP requests.
ArchiveStringTemplateGroup StringTemplateGroup (from org.antlr.stringtemplate) subclass to load templates from inside an archive file using TrueZip.
ArchiveStringTemplateHandler Handler for StringTemplate requests from a resource in the classpath or from an archive.
CloneableHeaders Wrapper for com.sun.net.httpserver.Headers that implements the Clonable interface and a copy constructor
CombinedRequest Support for combining several style sheets or javascripts into one request.
FileCombinedRequest Support for combining several style sheets or javascripts for file system based requests into one request.
FileHttpd Implementation of the abstract Httpd class for web content in the file system.
FileRequest Encapsulates an HTTP request for a resource in a local file system
FileRequestHandler An abstraction of a handler for local filesystem based HTTP requests.
FileStringTemplateHandler Handler for StringTemplate requests from a local filesystem.
Http Utility class providing various useful static methods
Httpd An embeddable Java web server that supports HTTP, HTTPS, templated content and serving content from inside a jar or archive (Supported types: jar, zip, tar, tar.gz, tar.bz2).
HttpResponse Encapsulates sending HTTP responses and provides several static methods for sending common HTTP error and informational responses.
JdbcBasicAuthenticator Implements a Basic Authenticator for authentication from a JDBC source.
Request Abstraction of an HTTP request
RequestHandler An abstraction of a handler for HTTP requests.
SimpleSessionManager  
StringTemplateHandler Provides a base handler class for templating based on the StringTemplate library (http://www.stringtemplate.org/) The Templates (which must have an extension of '.st') may be processed in three ways:
TemplatableAdapter Convenience class for implementing template processing classes
 

Enum Summary
DirItemInterface.SORTBY Used as a parameter to specify how the directory contents should be sorted
Httpd.LogLevel Logger level.
Httpd.ThreadModel Thread model for the server.
Request.HTTP_METHOD Enumeration of HTTP methods
